song.title: Came to my Rescue
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .B F# G#m7 E
[1] .B F# Falling on my knees in worship .G#m7 E B Giving all I am to seek Your face . F#/A# G#m7 E Lord all I am is is Yours
[C] . B F#/A# G#m7 I called You answered . E B and You came to my rescue and I . F#/A# G#m7 E I wanna be where You are
[Instrumental] .G#m7 F# B F# G#m7 F# E
[B] .G#m7 F#/A# B In my life be lifted high . F#/C# G#m7 In our world be lifted high . F# E F# (F) In our love be lifted high
---
[2] .B F# My whole life I place in Your hands .G#m7 E B God of mercy humbled I bow down . F# G#m7 E In your presence at Your throne
